item_prototype.name: {#POOL}: idle processes
item_prototype.description: Pool's number of processes in idle state.

item_prototype.name: {#POOL}: listen queue len
item_prototype.description: Pool's number of queued requests to socket.

item_prototype.name: {#POOL}: max children reached
item_prototype.description: Pool's max number of children processes of php-fpm reached.

item_prototype.name: {#POOL}: max active processes
item_prototype.description: Pool's max number of active processes.

item_prototype.name: {#POOL}: max listen queue
item_prototype.description: Pool's max number of queued requests from launch.

item_prototype.name: {#POOL}: slow requests
item_prototype.description: Pool's number of slow requests (slowlog should be enabled).

item_prototype.name: {#POOL}: total processes
item_prototype.description: Pool's total number of processes (active + idle).

trigger_prototype.name: {#POOL}: accepted connections over threshold
trigger_prototype.description: High priority alert if accepted connections per minute more than threshold.

trigger_prototype.name: {#POOL}: process manager was changed
trigger_prototype.description: Info alert if process manager was changed.

trigger_prototype.name: {#POOL}: queue detected
trigger_prototype.description: Warning alert if requests is adding in queue.

trigger_prototype.name: {#POOL}: slow requests detected
trigger_prototype.description: Warning alert if number of slow requests is growing up.

trigger_prototype.name: {#POOL}: used memory over threshold
trigger_prototype.description: Middle priority alert if used memory (%) over threshold.

trigger_prototype.name: {#POOL}: was restarted
trigger_prototype.description: Info alert if pool was restarted.
